body:
the MC was a virgin, the gyaru that he attacked in anger was a virgin.

SO in the end; he got a virgin GF with a baby.  The problem here was the FMC was a coward to CONFESS her jealousy but instead behind a slut.
Gyaru gonna have the best life. He probally gonna be a dr. in college while the FMC gonna be on the streets in years. LOL
Always hentai between debaucher, cuckold and scum, always the same stereotypes. What a rotten scriptwriter...

To those who can't read moon runes
In the final page the blonde chick told the mc(?) that she was a virgin and she had never even done ecchi stuff with other guy before
So he actually got a virgin gf
so win? i guess lmao
MC lost his crush but got a gyaru waifu, worth it? Who knows.
Well at least he had his shares
Did he impregnated the gyaru? better take responsibility then you twerp.
Lol at the end.. I'm surprised both of them weren't impregnated instead of just the one. This definitely needs an English translation.
lmao did he get pregnant that girl ? XD

Who is the artist anyway? All this stories just from group called FREEDOM PROPHET. I don't know why this group is too obsessed with NTR. Well NTR is fun to read but very quick boring too. Why? Because common NTR plots are same as usual like big dick always win, the girls ended become a slut, all MC are pathethic can't do anything except watching & fapping while crying etc. Just stop it right now, readers can get bored too...
I think mind break tag is missing
His art sure is getting better. I feel like vomiting when his other works looks 3d for some reason.
This author only makes garbage
Did he get that slut pregnant?
a little bit of gay stuff towards the end lmao
Well at least our MC have sex too
E
There are those that claim that many of his work is not ntr because most of the time they are not in a relationship. But it still conveys the depressing feeling in a comedic way.
THIS FUCKING AUTHOR ALWAYS MAKE NTR BULLSHIT IM HOPING MC MAKE GREAT REVENGE..

the stories of this artist are basically, a girl who looks pure and virgin and who from nothing for no apparent reason wants to have sex with anyone who appears in front ...... and the "MC" is only in the story for to use the Tag Ntr.
damn, i feel noting from ntr anymore XD
Why is this artist so obsessed with NTR can he at least make make a couple that don't have any or just make one where it's just rape no NTR please he has good artwork
tf happend in the last chapter?
